name: Space Mountain
theme: A high-speed journey through the cosmos in near-total darkness with twisting turns.
short_description: An iconic indoor roller coaster racing through the darkness of outer space.

name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
theme: A runaway mine train adventure through the Wild West mining town of Big Thunder.
short_description: The wildest ride in the wildernessâ€”a thrilling mine train roller coaster.

name: Splash Mountain (Closed for Reimagining)
theme: A musical log flume journey through the story of Br'er Rabbit with a thrilling splashdown finale.
short_description: Classic log flume ride being reimagined as Tiana's Bayou Adventure.

name: Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
theme: A family coaster through the diamond mine of the Seven Dwarfs with swaying ride vehicles.
short_description: A swinging mine train coaster through the world of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
theme: A boat adventure through Caribbean seas with pirates, treasure, and Captain Jack Sparrow.
short_description: A classic dark ride featuring pirate raids, treasure hunts, and adventure.

name: Haunted Mansion
theme: A tour through a mansion inhabited by 999 happy haunts with special effects and humor.
short_description: A whimsical dark ride through a house full of friendly ghosts and spirits.

name: Jungle Cruise
theme: A guided boat tour through exotic jungle rivers with humorous skipper narration and animatronic animals.
short_description: A comedic boat adventure through tropical rivers with pun-filled commentary.

name: It's a Small World
theme: A musical boat ride celebrating world cultures and children with the iconic song.
short_description: The classic singing boat ride promoting global unity and peace.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: Fly over London and through Neverland aboard a pirate galleon with Peter Pan.
short_description: A suspended dark ride flying through the magical story of Peter Pan.

name: Under the Sea ~ Journey of The Little Mermaid
theme: A gentle omnimover ride through Ariel's undersea world with classic songs and animatronics.
short_description: A family-friendly dark ride retelling The Little Mermaid with music and color.

name: Buzz Lightyear's Space Ranger Spin
theme: An interactive dark ride where guests help Buzz Lightyear defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets.
short_description: A family-friendly interactive shooting dark ride scoring points against Zurg.

name: TRON Lightcycle / Run
theme: Race on a Lightcycle through the Grid in this high-speed launched coaster inspired by TRON.
short_description: A launched roller coaster where riders lean forward on motorcycle-style Lightcycles.

name: Mad Tea Party
theme: Spinning teacups inspired by the Unbirthday Party scene from Alice in Wonderland.
short_description: A classic spinning teacup ride with guest-controlled spin speed.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Fly on Dumbo elephants with guest-controlled height adjustment.
short_description: A classic family spinner where guests soar on flying elephants.

name: The Barnstormer
theme: A kid-friendly coaster through Goofy's barnstorming stunt show.
short_description: A gentle introductory roller coaster themed to Goofy's daredevil stunts.

name: Prince Charming Regal Carrousel
theme: A classic carousel with hand-painted horses themed to Cinderella.
short_description: An ornate antique carousel with beautiful horses and Disney music.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
theme: A whimsical dark ride through the Hundred Acre Wood with Pooh and friends.
short_description: A gentle dark ride featuring Winnie the Pooh and his adventures.

name: Mickey's PhilharMagic
theme: A 3D concert film featuring Donald Duck's magical mishap with classic Disney songs and effects.
short_description: An immersive 3D movie experience with Disney music and in-theater effects.

name: Enchanted Tales with Belle
theme: An interactive storytelling experience where guests help reenact Belle's story in Maurice's cottage.
short_description: An immersive interactive show where guests participate in Belle's tale.

name: Be Our Guest Restaurant (Dining Experience)
theme: Dine in the Beast's enchanted castle with immersive theming from Beauty and the Beast.
short_description: A highly themed restaurant set inside Beast's castle with three dining rooms.

name: Astro Orbiter
theme: A retro-futuristic rocket spinner high above Tomorrowland.
short_description: A spinning rocket ride elevated above Tomorrowland with space-age theming.

name: Tomorrowland Speedway
theme: Drive your own gas-powered car on a guided track through a futuristic speedway.
short_description: A classic car ride where guests drive miniature race cars on a track.

name: Tomorrowland Transit Authority PeopleMover
theme: A relaxing elevated tour of Tomorrowland aboard a magnetically powered transit system.
short_description: A peaceful people-mover providing a scenic tour of Tomorrowland.

name: Monsters, Inc. Laugh Floor
theme: An interactive comedy show where animated monsters interact with the audience in real time.
short_description: A live interactive comedy club featuring Monsters, Inc. characters.

name: Walt Disney's Carousel of Progress
theme: A rotating theater show depicting American family life through different eras of technological progress.
short_description: A classic Audio-Animatronics show celebrating innovation and progress.

name: Tom Sawyer Island
theme: An island playground with caves, forts, and trails accessible by raft.
short_description: A self-guided wilderness island with caves and play areas.

name: Country Bear Jamboree
theme: A musical revue featuring singing Audio-Animatronic bears performing country and western songs.
short_description: A classic musical show with bear characters singing country tunes.

name: Liberty Square Riverboat
theme: A scenic cruise around the Rivers of America aboard a steam-powered riverboat.
short_description: A relaxing riverboat tour offering scenic views of Frontierland and Liberty Square.

name: The Hall of Presidents
theme: An educational show featuring Audio-Animatronic figures of all U.S. Presidents.
short_description: A patriotic presentation showcasing American history and all U.S. Presidents.

name: The Magic Carpets of Aladdin
theme: Fly on magic carpets around a golden lamp with guest-controlled height and tilt.
short_description: A spinner ride themed to Aladdin where guests control flying carpets.

name: Swiss Family Treehouse
theme: A walkthrough of the Robinson family's treehouse home from Swiss Family Robinson.
short_description: A self-guided tour through an elaborate treehouse with multiple levels.

name: Walt Disney World Railroad
theme: A grand circle tour of Magic Kingdom aboard vintage steam trains with multiple stations.
short_description: A scenic steam train circling the park with stops in Main Street, Frontierland, and Fantasyland.

name: Happily Ever After (Nighttime Spectacular)
theme: A fireworks and projection show on Cinderella Castle celebrating Disney storytelling and dreams.
short_description: Magic Kingdom's premier nighttime spectacular with fireworks and castle projections.

name: Disney Festival of Fantasy Parade
theme: A daytime parade featuring elaborate floats celebrating Disney stories and characters.
short_description: A colorful daily parade with massive floats and Disney characters.

name: Mickey's Royal Friendship Faire
theme: A live stage show on the castle forecourt celebrating friendship with Mickey and friends.
short_description: A musical stage show featuring Mickey, Minnie, and characters from various Disney films.
